name: Frithjof: The Thief of Peace
description:
Frithjof : The Thief of Peace

Frithjof : The Thief of Peace is a game where you fight goblins to save your tree from them , after every wave you get upgrade to help you defeating them in the battle.

Frithjof is a Game made for EGD Game Jam 
Total time worked on the game : 10 hours
